about_the_game:
The new work by Flounder Studios - "Strive For Power:King Growth Program"

"Strive For Power:King Growth Program" is an ancient emperor simulator, in which you will play as a king of the Han Dynasty, using your own strategies and tactics to rule the country and outsmart foreign enemies! With a harem of three thousand beautiful women, including gentle empresses and charming concubines, continuously collect all kinds of beauties!


★ Game Features ★
-Immersive recreation of the life of a Han Dynasty emperor Simulate the real court and the state, attend court sessions to manage the six ministries, gather popular support, and enhance prestige

-Amidst the crowd, I search for her; I form deep connections with kindred spirits, welcome the beautiful into my life, and encounter thousands of beauties.

-Simulate real palace intrigue Cultivate loyal confidants, capture those with ill intentions, can you discern the ambitions of your officials

-Thrilling battles of wit and courage Train brave armies, defend towns, vie for dominance on the battlefield, ultimately unify the realm

-Open character customization Open customizable modules, support character and attribute customization, build your ideal empire.
*The functionalities are expected to be supported in the first major update after the release. Stay tuned!
